- Bug Fixes

- Settings Menu

- iOS 10 updates
- Calendar view mode
- Replaced 'Friendly' theme with 'Glacier' theme
- Apply themes without reloading
- Detailed stats per activity 
- Done button for keyboard
- Bigger note taking section

Please rate and review and tell me what features you would like changed or added!

Thanks for supporting Naughty! Great things are in development!

- Updated logo
- Updated display name to 'Nice'
- Calendar can now display icons instead of activity count
- You can now remove default activities, except for 'Sex' (premium)
- Calendar view now loads months based on your activities
- Collapsable sections are now default
- Improved activity caching
- Removed pink theme
- Import activities from a JSON file (premium)
- Today's date in calendar is now colored

First minor update for 2017!
- stats are now calculated correctly
- new animation when selecting a day on the calendar
- fixed obscure ui bug that would cause a crash when touching a table header

Look out for version 3.0! With some new features and new look!

Be sure to email me at dev@scottjulian.com if you have any suggestions and feedback.

Thanks for your support!

Thanks for your support!

- PIN and TouchID now combined, you must have a PIN to enable Touch ID (security preferences have been reset)
- Added animation to PIN pad
- Fixed Import/Export JSON to now properly be compatible (sorry!)
- Removed CSV from export options
- URL scheme insert keys have been updated to reflect JSON changes
- Small calendar updates
- Misc logic improvements

Thanks for supporting Naughty! For more info visit https://scottjulian.com/naughtyapp/

- New in-app purchase: Unlock Statistics Only
- Added a new link in the about section to help fix HealthKit permission issues (for example: when your calendar is blank)
- Added alert message when trying to restore purchases fails

I've heard your requests and I will bring back viewing individual stats details as well as add in a date range filter for statistics!

Thanks for supporting Naughty!

I have read your emails and listened to your requests! Sorry for the slow updates, as a single dev with a family and day job, I can only work so fast! I am working on your requests. Thanks for supporting Naughty!

- NEW: Keep track of your Partners!
- NEW: Partner Statistics
- stats now groups activities by entry and not individually
- fixed bug in protection selection
- fixed issue with incorrect 'days since last' stat
- fixed issue with month label not updating correctly
- memory and UI performance improvements

- NEW: Keep track of your Partners!

- New: You can now add a partner from the select screen when adding a new entry
- New: You can toggle autocorrect in the settings
- New: Passcode view now reflects selected theme
- Re-added activity counts in the stats
- All list grouping styles are now free
- Partner names are now sorted alphabetically 
- Settings layout updated
- Removed 'Simple Green' theme
- Updated biometric support
- Under the hood refactoring (the tests pass, but let me know of any bugs you find!)

Now that ratings don't reset every update, I will be pushing more frequent updates. I am currently working on: 
- save data locally and have HealthKit be optional
- more stats and more accurate stats (better looking UI and the ability to search, sort, and restrict date ranges)
- apple watch support
- re-branding
- custom re-ordering of activities
- saved locations with custom location names

The Big Optimization Update v3.5.0:
- Better memory management
- Updated new/edit entry form
- Dark keyboard for dark colored themes
- New font
- Better iPad layout sizing
- Quick entries sorting and grouping
- Search notes field
- Swipe to delete an entry from calendar view
- Location coordinates displayed on details view
- Crisp UI/UX tweaks and other tiny bugs squashed that no one will notice

Thanks for being a Nice user! And as always, your feedback is appreciated!
